member.name: T:Photon.Hive.Caching.RoomReference
member.summary: Used to observe references to room instances from a room cache. A reference to a room should be released (disposed) if it is not longer needed. The related cache observes the number of references to a room and removes a room if it has no references left.
member.remarks: In the Lite application the room reference will be stored in a peers state property whern the peer joines a room. When a peer leaves a room the reference to the room will be disposed. This pattern ensures that room/game instances will not be disposed if there are still peers/clients holding a reference to the room/game.

member.name: F:Photon.Hive.Caching.RoomReference.id
member.summary: The id.

member.name: F:Photon.Hive.Caching.RoomReference.roomCache

member.param: An instance which obtained the room reference.

member.name: T:Photon.Hive.Common.GameParameterReader
member.summary: Provides methods to read build in game properties from a hashtable.
member.remarks: Build in game properties in the load balancing project are stored as byte values. Because some protocols used by photon (Flash, WebSockets) does not support byte values the properties will also be searched in the hashtable using there int representation. If an int representation is found it will be converted to the byte representation of the game property.

member.name: T:Photon.Hive.Common.Utilities
member.summary: A collection of methods useful in one or another context.

member.name: M:Photon.Hive.Common.Utilities.ConvertAs3WellKnownPropertyKeys(System.Collections.Hashtable,System.Collections.Hashtable)
member.summary: Converts well known properties sent by AS3/Flash clients - from string to byte-keys.
member.remarks: Check if peer is a flash (amf3) client because flash clients does not support byte keys in a hastable. If a flash client likes to match a game with a specific 'MaxPlayer' value 'MaxPlayer' will be sent with the string key "255" and the max player value as int.

member.name: M:Photon.Hive.Common.Utilities.ConvertAs3WellKnownPropertyKeys(System.Collections.IList,System.Collections.IList)
member.summary: Converts well known properties sent by AS3/Flash clients - from string to byte-keys.

member.name: T:Photon.Hive.Room
member.summary: A room has s, can have properties, and provides an with a few wrapper methods to solve otherwise complicated threading issues: All actions enqueued to the are executed in a serial order. Operations of all Actors in a room are handled via ExecutionFiber.

member.name: M:Photon.Hive.Room.Finalize
member.summary: Finalizes an instance of the class. This destructor will run only if the Dispose method does not get called. It gives your base class the opportunity to finalize. Do not provide destructors in types derived from this class.

member.name: M:Photon.Hive.Room.BeforeRemoveFromCache
member.summary: Called by the if the room is about to be removed from the cache.
member.returns: True if the room should be automaticly by removed by the . False if the room has an custom remove implementation and will remove itself from the cache.
member.remarks: The default implementation checks if the EmptyRoomLiveTime value is set to a value greater zero. If it's set the method will return false to indicate that the cache should not remove this instance automaticly. The removal of the room is then scheduled using the .

member.name: M:Photon.Hive.Room.EnqueueMessage(Photon.Hive.Messages.IMessage)
member.summary: Enqueues an to the end of the execution queue.
member.remarks: is called sequentially for each operation request stored in the execution queue. Using an execution queue ensures that messages are processed in order and sequentially to prevent object synchronization (multi threading).

member.name: M:Photon.Hive.Room.EnqueueOperation(Photon.Hive.HivePeer,Photon.SocketServer.OperationRequest,Photon.SocketServer.SendParameters)
member.summary: Enqueues an to the end of the execution queue.
member.remarks: is called sequentially for each operation request stored in the execution queue. Using an execution queue ensures that operation request are processed in order and sequentially to prevent object synchronization (multi threading).

member.summary: Schedules a message to be processed after a specified time.
member.param: The time in milliseconds to wait before the message will be processed.
member.returns: an

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Photon.Hive.Operations.JoinGameRequest.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Photon.Hive.Operations.JoinGameRequest.ActorProperties
member.summary: Gets or sets custom actor properties.

member.name: P:Photon.Hive.Operations.JoinGameRequest.BroadcastActorProperties
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the actor properties should be included in the event which will be sent to all clients currently in the room.

member.name: P:Photon.Hive.Operations.JoinGameRequest.GameId
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the game (room).

member.name: P:Photon.Hive.Operations.JoinGameRequest.GameProperties
member.summary: Gets or sets custom game properties.
member.remarks: Game properties will only be applied for the game creator.

member.name: P:Photon.Hive.Operations.JoinGameRequest.DeleteCacheOnLeave
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether cached events are automaticly deleted for actors which are leaving a room.

member.name: P:Photon.Hive.Operations.JoinGameRequest.SuppressRoomEvents
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating if common room events (Join, Leave) will be suppressed.
member.remarks: This property will only be applied for the game creator.

member.name: P:Photon.Hive.Operations.JoinGameRequest.ActorNr
member.summary: Actor number, which will be used for rejoin

member.name: P:Photon.Hive.Operations.JoinGameRequest.EmptyRoomLiveTime
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating how long the room instance will be keeped alive in the room cache after all peers have left the room.
member.remarks: This property will only be applied for the room creator.

member.name: P:Photon.Hive.Operations.JoinGameRequest.PlayerTTL
member.summary: The time a player the room waits to allow a player to rejoin after a disconnect. If player should be allowed to return any time set the value less than 0.

member.name: P:Photon.Hive.Operations.JoinGameRequest.CheckUserOnJoin
member.summary: Set true to restrict useres to connect only once. Default is not to check.

member.name: P:Photon.Hive.Operations.JoinGameRequest.CacheSlice
member.summary: The lowest slice of cached events the actor expects to recieve.

member.name: P:Photon.Hive.Operations.JoinGameRequest.Plugins
member.summary: Informs the server of the expected plugin setup.
member.remarks: The operation will fail in case of a plugin missmatch returning error code PluginMismatch 32757(0x7FFF - 10). Setting string[]{} means the client expects no plugin to be setup. Note: for backwards compatibility null omits any check.

member.name: T:Photon.Hive.HivePeer
member.summary: Inheritance class of . The LitePeer dispatches incoming s at OnOperationRequest. When joining a a is stored in the property. An guarantees that all outgoing messages (events/operations) are sent one after the other.

member.name: F:Photon.Hive.HivePeer.log
member.summary: An instance used to log messages to the logging framework.

member.name: M:Photon.Hive.HivePeer.#ctor(Photon.SocketServer.InitRequest)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Photon.Hive.HivePeer.ValidateOperation(Photon.SocketServer.Rpc.Operation,Photon.SocketServer.SendParameters)
member.summary: Checks if a operation is valid. If the operation is not valid an operation response containing a desciptive error message will be sent to the peer.
member.returns: true if the operation is valid; otherwise false.

member.name: M:Photon.Hive.HivePeer.RemovePeerFromCurrentRoom(System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Checks if the the state of peer is set to a reference of a room. If a room refrence is present the peer will be removed from the related room and the reference will be disposed. Disposing the reference allows the associated room factory to remove the room instance if no more references to the room exists.

member.name: M:Photon.Hive.HivePeer.GetRoomReference(Photon.Hive.Operations.JoinGameRequest,System.Object[])
member.summary: Called by to get a room reference for a join operations. This method can be overloaded by inheritors to provide custom room references.
member.param: more arguments in order to create room
member.returns: An instance.

member.name: M:Photon.Hive.HivePeer.HandleGameOperation(Photon.SocketServer.OperationRequest,Photon.SocketServer.SendParameters)
member.summary: Enqueues game related operation requests in the peers current game.
member.remarks:
The current for a peer is stored in the peers state property. Using the method ensures that all operation request dispatch logic has thread safe access to all room instance members since they are processed in a serial order.
Inheritors can use this method to enqueue there custom game operation to the peers current game.

member.name: M:Photon.Hive.HivePeer.HandleJoinGameOperation(Photon.SocketServer.OperationRequest,Photon.SocketServer.SendParameters)
member.summary: Handles the to enter a . This method removes the peer from any previously joined room, finds the room intended for join and enqueues the operation for it to handle.

member.name: M:Photon.Hive.HivePeer.HandleJoinOperation(Photon.SocketServer.OperationRequest,Photon.SocketServer.SendParameters)
member.summary: Handles the to enter a . This method removes the peer from any previously joined room, finds the room intended for join and enqueues the operation for it to handle.

member.name: M:Photon.Hive.HivePeer.HandleLeaveOperation(Photon.SocketServer.OperationRequest,Photon.SocketServer.SendParameters)
member.summary: Handles the to leave a .

member.name: M:Photon.Hive.HivePeer.HandlePingOperation(Photon.SocketServer.OperationRequest,Photon.SocketServer.SendParameters)
member.summary: Handles a ping operation.

member.name: M:Photon.Hive.HivePeer.OnDisconnect(PhotonHostRuntimeInterfaces.DisconnectReason,System.String)
member.summary: Called when client disconnects. Ensures that disconnected players leave the game . The player is not removed immediately but a message is sent to the room. This avoids threading issues by making sure the player remove is not done concurrently with operations.

member.name: M:Photon.Hive.HivePeer.OnOperationRequest(Photon.SocketServer.OperationRequest,Photon.SocketServer.SendParameters)
member.summary: Called when the client sends an .

member.summary: Gets or sets a when joining a .

member.summary: Event parameter to indicate whether events are cached for new actors.

member.summary: Event parameter containing a value.

member.summary: The data.

member.summary: the flush event code for raise event.

member.name: F:Photon.Hive.Operations.ParameterKey.DeleteCacheOnLeave
member.summary: Event parameter to indicate whether cached events are deleted automaticly for actors leaving a room.

member.name: F:Photon.Hive.Operations.ParameterKey.Group
member.summary: The group this event should be sent to. No error is happening if the group is empty or not existing.

member.name: F:Photon.Hive.Operations.ParameterKey.GroupsForRemove
member.summary: Groups to leave. Null won't remove any groups. byte[0] will remove ALL groups. Otherwise only the groups listed will be removed.

member.name: F:Photon.Hive.Operations.ParameterKey.PublishUserId
member.summary: Should or not JoinGame response and JoinEvent contain user ids

member.name: F:Photon.Hive.Operations.ParameterKey.GroupsForAdd
member.summary: Groups to enter. Null won't add groups. byte[0] will add ALL groups. Otherwise only the groups listed will be added.

member.name: F:Photon.Hive.Operations.ParameterKey.SuppressRoomEvents
member.summary: A parameter indicating if common room events (Join, Leave) will be suppressed.

member.name: F:Photon.Hive.Operations.ParameterKey.EmptyRoomLiveTime
member.summary: A parameter indicating how long a room instance should be kept alive in the room cache after all players left the room.

member.name: F:Photon.Hive.Operations.ParameterKey.PlayerTTL
member.summary: A parameter indicating how long a player is allowd to rejoin.

member.name: F:Photon.Hive.Operations.ParameterKey.HttpForward
member.summary: A parameter indicating that content of room event should be forwarded to some server

member.name: F:Photon.Hive.Operations.ParameterKey.IsInactive
member.summary: Allows the player to re-join the game.

member.name: F:Photon.Hive.Operations.ParameterKey.CheckUserOnJoin
member.summary: Activates UserId checks on joining - allowing a users to be only once in the room. Default is deactivated for backwards compatibility, but we recomend to use in future Note: Should be active for saved games.
